parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an object's rendered [[PositionATL|3D position ATL]] (z value above ground) in render time scope.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''getPosATLVisual''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]: - name of the object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionATL]]

  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_playerRenderedPosATL = [[getPosATLVisual]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPosVisual]], [[getPosASLVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[visiblePosition]], [[position]], [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosASLW]]
</value></part></template></root>
